code.var: if('{en2}' != '') {'Motor {NAME}({pwm1}, {dir1}, {en1}, {pwm2}, {dir2}, {en2});'} else if('{en1}' != '' && ('{dir2}' != '' || '{pwm2}' != '')) {'Motor {NAME}({pwm1}, {dir1}, {en1}, {pwm2}, {dir2});'} else if('{dir2}' != '' || '{pwm2}' != '') {'Motor {NAME}({pwm1}, {dir1}, {pwm2}, {dir2});'} else if('{en1}' !== '') {'Motor {NAME}({pwm1}, {dir1}, {en1});'} else {'Motor {NAME}({pwm1}, {dir1});'}
